reviewText:
She is the best. I already have my CEN and CCRN. I passed the CCRN exam easily after using the CCRN review tapes.
Now I buy her DVD's every couple of years and study them as review. These DVD's refresh my knowledge and get me thinking about topics that do not come up very often. I am in my 35th year of nursing and will continue to use and recommend her study tapes for both ICU and ER.
Knowing this material as she teaches it has helped me change the mind of physicians and provide better care of patient's.
